tool_description: Calculates optimal reorder points for products based on demand forecasts, lead times, and service level requirements.

product_ids.description: List of product SKUs to calculate reorder points for

average_daily_demand.description: Average daily demand for each product (must match product_ids order)

demand_variability.description: Standard deviation of daily demand for each product

lead_time_days.description: Lead time in days for each product from suppliers

lead_time_variability.description: Standard deviation of lead times for each product

error_messages: Array length mismatch: All input arrays must have the same length and match the number of product_ids.
Invalid demand values: average_daily_demand and demand_variability must be positive numbers.
Invalid lead time: lead_time_days must be positive integers.
Invalid service level: target_service_level must be between 0.90 and 0.99.
Negative variability: Variability values cannot be negative.
usage: Provide matched arrays of product information including demand patterns and lead times. The tool calculates reorder points that maintain the target service level.

reorder_points.description: Calculated reorder point for each product

safety_stock_levels.description: Required safety stock levels for each product

service_level_achieved.description: Expected service level achieved for each product
